title: Myself
body:
Hey Riot,my username is xImKiingx and i was really toxic all the time.I will try to do better so please dont do nothing t me
Yours, xImKiingx

replies.body: It's good to hear that you're looking to change and wanting to reform from being toxic. I can't really promise that nothing will happen to you based on your previous toxicity, but hopefully turning a new leaf now will prevent you from getting any sort of future behavior punishments. :)
